en.restartDesc: Press CONFIRM to reset the level.
en.dragItemDesc: Drag the material into the world.
en.dragScreenDesc: Drag anywhere on the screen to move the view.
en.introDesc1:
Matters are things that have mass and volume.

You can measure and observe a matter's physical and chemical property.
en.introDesc2:
Physical properties can be observed with your senses.

This includes the state of matter: solid, liquid, gas.
en.introDesc3:
Chemical properties can only be observed when matter undergoes a change.

The resulting matter becomes something else entirely.
